title: 8-8  Summing series
description:
Write a header file that contains the following functions:

/* Compute m(n) = 1/2 + 2/3 + ... + n/(n+1) */
double m(int n)

/* Display the table as output sample*/
void display()

The function display() outputs the table as the sample output. You should set the width of print field of each column to 12, set the precision of floating-point numbers to 4 and fixed, justify the output to the right.
author: 程序设计I Chapter5 Functions
hint: You should submit the implementation of the function but do not submit the main() function.
